name: Red Voxel
description:
A voxel art fps PvE game. Your aim is to try and last as long as possible in the arena of robots that are trying to kill you. You can buy weapons in the shop with the monsters that you kill.

Controls:

  1. Look with mouse
  2. Left click to shoot
  3. WSAD / Arrow Keys to move
  4. Escape to pause

This was made for OMG jam 3 choosing the theme of Man vs Machine.
